content: goldfish applique designed by crochetcrafters1 © 2025 crochetcrafters1 - all rights reserved this pattern and its contents are only for personal use do not copy edit redistribute or sell this pattern you are welcome to sell finished products with your own photos in small quantities but if you do so please give pattern credit to crochetcrafters1 thank you and enjoy stitches and abbreviations - this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - orange - yarn needle - scissors final size - length 5 cm and width 2 5 cm technical notes *the goldfish is worked in one piece *round 2 is the tail *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains or slip_stitch joins *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern goldfish orange round 1 make a magic_ring chain 1 into the magic circle make 4 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet chain 2 1 double_crochet 3 half_double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 9 sts making the tail round 2 chain 3 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 slip_stitch then 1 single_crochet then make 1 slip_stitch in the first st repeat to make two fins 6 sts *fasten_off link to video https //youtu be/dap8z9bq7os if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
